name: crumbs (edgelordname)
description:
Survive and get as high a score as possible in this crumbling world.

Warning, there is a lot of angst in this one.

Jump over short obstacles!

Slide under tall obstacles!

Regular Mode:
The more forgiving enemies are more common, you can take extra hits, and the ramp-up speed is less steep!

Hard Mode: 
The less forgiving enemies are much more common, one hit and you are done, ramp-up speed is doble that of Regular Mode.
